constants: int TYPE_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_REGISTERED The registration has already been done for the given account.
int TYPE_ALREADY_REGISTERED_BY_ANOTHER_ACCOUNT The registration has already been done by another account ID.
int TYPE_REMOVE_RIGHTS The rights need to be removed completely.
int TYPE_RIGHTS_INSTALLED The rights have been successfully downloaded and installed.
int TYPE_RIGHTS_REMOVED The rights have been removed.
int TYPE_WAIT_FOR_RIGHTS The rights object is being delivered to the device.

From class android.drm.DrmEvent String DRM_INFO_OBJECT The key that is used in the attributes HashMap to pass the DrmInfo object. String DRM_INFO_STATUS_OBJECT The key that is used in the attributes HashMap to pass the return status. int TYPE_ALL_RIGHTS_REMOVED All of the rights information associated with all DRM schemes have been successfully removed. int TYPE_DRM_INFO_PROCESSED The given DRM information has been successfully processed.
